sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Col, Container, Row, Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'
import MainScreen from '../../components/MainScreen/MainScreen'

const AgregarUsuario = () => {
    return (
        <MainScreen title="Admin - Agregar Usuario">
            <Container>
                <Form>
                    <Row>

                        <Col>
                            <Form.Group controlId="nombre" className='mb-4'>
                                <Form.Label>Nombre</Form.Label>
                                <Form.Control
                                    type="text"
                                    //value={name}
                                    placeholder="Ingrese el nombre completo"
                                //onChange={(e) => setName(e.target.value)}
                                />
                            </Form.Group>

                            <Form.Group controlId="email" className='mb-4'>
                                <Form.Label>Correo electronico</Form.Label>
                                <Form.Control
                                    type="text"
                                    //value={name}
                                    placeholder="Ingrese el email"
                                //onChange={(e) => setName(e.target.value)}
                                />
                            </Form.Group>


                        </Col>

                        <Col>
                            <Form.Group controlId="salario" className='mb-4'>
                                <Form.Label>Salario</Form.Label>
                                <Form.Control
                                    type="number"
                                    //value={name}
                                    placeholder="Ingrese el salario en colones (â‚¡)"
                                //onChange={(e) => setName(e.target.value)}
                                />
                            </Form.Group>

                            <Form.Group controlId='restaurante' className='mb-4'>
                                <Form.Label>Restaurante asignado</Form.Label>
                                <Form.Select>
                                    <option value="">---</option>
                                </Form.Select>
                            </Form.Group>

                            <Form.Group controlId='estado' className='mb-4'>
                                <Form.Label>Estado del usuario</Form.Label>
                                <Form.Select>
                                    <option value="activo">Activo</option>
                                    <option value="inactivo">Inactivo</option>
                                </Form.Select>
                            </Form.Group>


                        </Col>
                    </Row>
                </Form>
            </Container>
        </MainScreen>
    )
}

export default AgregarUsuario
